mapper.select: select PSN_PR_NO ,PSN_PR_STACK ,PSN_PR_CONTENT ,PSN_PR_AVLPRD ,PSN_PR_TITLE ,PSN_PR_CONTACT ,to_char(CREATE_DATE) AS "CREATE_DATE" ,USER_NO ,USER_NAME ,CATEGORY ,PROFILE ,COUNT FROM PSN_PR_BOARD JOIN TB_MEMBER USING (USER_NO) ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: insert into psn_pr_board (psn_pr_no,PSN_PR_STACK,PSN_PR_CONTENT,PSN_PR_AVLPRD,PSN_PR_TITLE,PSN_PR_CONTACT,CREATE_DATE,USER_NO,CATEGORY, COUNT) values (SEQ_PSN_PR.NEXTVAL, #{psnPrStack}, #{psnPrContent},#{psnPrAvlPrd}, #{psnPrTitle},#{psnPrContact},to_char(sysdate,'yy/MM/dd HH24:mi'),#{userNo},#{category},0 )
mapper.update: update PSN_PR_BOARD set count = count + 1 where PSN_PR_NO = #{psnPrNo}
mapper.select: select PSN_PR_NO ,PSN_PR_STACK ,PSN_PR_CONTENT ,PSN_PR_AVLPRD ,PSN_PR_TITLE ,PSN_PR_CONTACT ,to_char(CREATE_DATE) AS "CREATE_DATE" ,USER_NO ,PROFILE ,USER_NAME ,CATEGORY ,COUNT FROM PSN_PR_BOARD JOIN TB_MEMBER USING (USER_NO) where PSN_PR_NO = #{PSN_PR_NO}
